attributes.action: funding for NHS for to raise awareness and support investigations into FND
attributes.additional_details: Healthcare professionals don’t know or haven’t heard about this horrible neurological disorder after we are diagnosed we are just left to get on with whatever it throws at us. We deserve support and care as much as anyone else
attributes.background: Have healthcare professionals education on FND and look into a treatment to help cure or make our lives easier.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

NHS-funded rehabilitation to be made more accessible for FND patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751405

Review support for FND sufferers and waiting times for treatment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755906

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/
